title: Hunting
description: Fear. Dr. Julia Bellows understood fear. Loss had made it as much a part of her as living and breathing. But that didn't mean she needed Dr. Malachi Brockman being an overprotective Galahad. She could take care of herself. Didn't need him interfering in her lifeâ€”personal or professional.Dr. Malachi Brockman was determined to keep an eye on the widowed Medical Examiner assigned to his unit in the PAVAD directorate of the FBI. She got under his skin, made him care...too much. Now she'd become a pawn in a deadly game. The Chessmaster's weapon against Malachi. And he'd protect her at all cost...even if that meant becoming the killer's next victim...
author: Calle J. Brookes
